mapper.sql: id, parent, content, like_count, active_id, user_id, is_deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into comment(parent, content, active_id, user_id) values (#{parent}, #{content}, #{activeId}, #{userId})
mapper.update: update comment set like_count = like_count + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select from comment where active_id = #{activeId} and is_deleted = 0
